en_text: Look at this.
jp_text: これを…―

en_text: This is the promissory note you signed with Luna Nova one thousand years ago.
jp_text:
あなたが1000年前に
ルーナノヴァと交わした借用書です
google_translated:
You 1000 years ago
It is a borrowed book that I exchanged with Lo Nanova

en_text: Promissory note?
jp_text: （校長たち）えっ？

en_text: That was a promissory note?
jp_text: あれ 借用書だったの？

en_text: Yes, but it's written in ancient Dragonese, so nobody could read it.
jp_text:
古代ドラゴン語なので
誰も読めなかったのです
google_translated:
Because it is an ancient dragon language
No one could read

en_text: And you can, Diana?
jp_text: ダイアナは読めるの？

en_text: Yes, I became fluent at the age of twelve.
jp_text: はい ですが

en_text: There is no mention of interest anywhere on this.
jp_text:
ここには 利息について
何も書かれていません
google_translated:
About interest here
Nothing is written

en_text: Which means there was never a need to pay interest in the first place.
jp_text:
つまり 利子を払う必要は
最初から なかった！―
google_translated:
In other words, it is necessary to pay interest
It was not the first!-

en_text: You had them pay nonexistent interest!
jp_text:
ありもしない利子を
払わせていたのです！

en_text: I declare a contract that old invalid!
jp_text:
そんな大昔の約束なんぞ
もう無効！

en_text: Then are we to understand that the debt itself is also invalidated?
jp_text:
（ダイアナ）それでは
借金自体も無効…
google_translated:
So
Debt itself is also invalid ...

en_text: the sum of the payments made by Luna Nova far exceeds the principal sum of the initial debt.
jp_text:
ルーナノヴァが支払った金額は
既に元本を上回ります
google_translated:
The amount paid by Lou Nanova
Already exceeding the principal

en_text: the amount of capital Luna Nova has paid off as interest has far exceeded the initial investment.
jp_text:
計算では
これまでに利子として―
google_translated:
In the calculation
As an interest as interest

en_text: Considering that the interest itself has been invalidated,\Nmay we assume the rest of the debt to be cleared?
jp_text:
借用の返済は 既に
完了ということでよろしいですね？
google_translated:
Repayment of borrowing has already been
Is it good for completion, right?

en_text: Considering the stated reasons, we request the immediate return of our Sorcerer's Stone, Mister Fafnir.
jp_text:
（ダイアナ）以上の理由において
まずは魔導石をご返却願えますか？
google_translated:
or more reasons
First of all, do you want to return the magic stone?

en_text: Thank goodness!
jp_text:
（ファフニール）フン！
（アッコ）あ？

en_text: We're saved...
jp_text: （ファフニール）むう…

en_text: The world has no need for dragons or witches in this age of science.
jp_text: この科学の時代―

en_text: Magic is fated to be forgotten in the near future.
jp_text:
魔法は そう遠くないうちに
消え去る運命じゃよ
google_translated:
The magic is not so far
It is the destiny to disappear

en_text: That won't happen!
jp_text: そんなことないよ！

en_text: It's been quite some time since I've last heard someone spout a line this naive.
jp_text:
そんな青臭いセリフを聞くのは
久しぶりじゃな
google_translated:
Listen to such a blue-like serif
It's been a long time

en_text: Just you watch! I'm gonna become an amazing witch one day and make the whole world gasp in surprise!
jp_text:
世界中を
あっと言わせてやるんだから！
google_translated:
All over the world
I'll let you say it!

en_text: Hmph! Is that the dream you were talking about?
jp_text:
フン！ それが
お前さんの夢というわけか？
google_translated:
Hun!that is
Are you a dream of your dream?

en_text: That's right!
jp_text: そう！

en_text: You'll learn soon enough that no man can live off dreams alone.
jp_text:
（ファフニール）フン！
夢だけで食っていけるもんか
google_translated:
Hun!
Can you eat with only dreams

en_text: To think that there were still humans\Nwith that look in their eyes.
jp_text:
（ファフニール）うむ… まだ
あんな顔をする人間がいたとはな
google_translated:
Um ... still
There is no one who has such a face

en_text: So in the end, we're back to laundry duty.
jp_text:
しかたないでしょ 規則を破って
勝手に学校を出たんだから
google_translated:
I can't beat the rules
Because I went to school myself

en_text: Be grateful this is the end of our punishment.
jp_text:
これくらいの罰当番で済んで
よかったよ
google_translated:
It is finished with this fine number
It was very nice

en_text: Yeah, but it still sucks that Diana totally stole the show.
jp_text:
ダイアナに
持っていかれちまったからな
google_translated:
To Diana
It's been brought to you

en_text: Just how perfect can one girl be?
jp_text:
（アマンダ）
全く どんだけ完璧なんだよ
google_translated: At all he is perfect only

en_text: She's so perfect I wanna hurl.
jp_text: 完璧すぎて ヘドが出るぜ
google_translated: It's too perfect to get a hed

en_text: I have no qualms with her as my rival.
jp_text:
まあ ライバルとしては
不足はないけどね
google_translated:
Well, as a rival
There is no shortage

en_text: Remember your place as the school's biggest dunce.
jp_text:
お前 学校一の落ちこぼれのくせに
ヘヘン
google_translated:
In the fall of the fall of the school
Hahen

en_text: The biggest dunce here is you, Amanda!
jp_text:
学校一の落ちこぼれは
アマンダ あんたでしょ！
google_translated:
The school of the school is
Amanda Annow!

en_text: It's you, Akko!
jp_text:
（アマンダ）
はあ？ 全然足りてねえだろ！

en_text: Please just stop it already, you two!
jp_text:
（ロッテ）
もう やめてよ ２人とも～

en_text: Chasing after a shooting star
jp_text:
♪夢中になって
　　　追いかけてた

en_text: Longing to know more about this world
jp_text:
♪広がる世界を
　　　知りたくて

en_text: kanaetai to negau dake ja nai
jp_text:
♪叶えたいと
　　　願うだけじゃない
google_translated:
♪ I want to fulfill
I just hope

en_text: But if you only push open the door
jp_text: ♪扉を開ければ ほら

en_text: chikadzuite yukeru yo
jp_text: ♪近づいていけるよ

en_text: Let's go on a journey to find\Nthe next page of our story
jp_text:
♪待ちきれない物語の
　　　　　　続きを探そう
google_translated:
♪ Of a story that can not wait
Let's find the continuation

en_text: You're not the only one\Nwho believes in the future
jp_text: ♪未来 信じられるのは
google_translated: ♪ I can believe in the future

en_text: The scenery may be ever-changing
jp_text:
♪景色は
　　　変わっていくけど

en_text: I'll never let go of the\Ntreasures we collected together
jp_text: ♪巡り合った 宝物

en_text: Thank you for staying by my side
jp_text:
♪側にいてくれて
　　　　　ありがとう
google_translated:
♪ I'm on the side
     Thank you

jp_text: ♪また明日ね
google_translated: ♪ I will see you again tomorrow
